name: smart-vscode
description: SmartVscode: Controlling VS Code by natural language

smartVscode.modelType.markdownDescription: Select the model type: **OpenAI** or **Tongyi**. **Please choose one model type and fill in the corresponding API Key and model settings below.**

smartVscode.openai.apiBaseUrl.markdownDescription: OpenAI API Base URL. **Use only if you have selected OpenAI.** Ensure the format is correct, e.g., starts with `https://` and does not have a trailing slash.

smartVscode.openai.apiKey.markdownDescription: **OpenAI API Key**. **Use only if you have selected OpenAI.** [Get your OpenAI API Key](https://beta.openai.com/account/api-keys).

smartVscode.openai.chatLightModel.markdownDescription: Lightweight OpenAI model for simple reasoning steps. **Use only if you have selected OpenAI.** [Documentation](https://beta.openai.com/docs/models/models).
enumDescriptions: GPT-4 Turbo model available with ChatGPT Plus subscription. Ensure you have the appropriate OpenAI subscription.
A specific version of the GPT-4 model enhanced for particular tasks or domains, potentially offering specialized capabilities or features compared to the standard GPT-4.
A smaller and more efficient version of gpt-4o, designed for environments with limited computational resources, providing a balance between performance and resource usage.
Default GPT-4 Turbo model used in ChatGPT Plus subscription. Ensure you have the appropriate OpenAI subscription.
Most capable GPT-3.5 model, optimized for current tasks.

smartVscode.openai.chatAdvancedModel.markdownDescription: Advanced OpenAI model for complex reasoning steps. **Use only if you have selected OpenAI.** [Documentation](https://beta.openai.com/docs/models/models).
enumDescriptions: GPT-4 Turbo model available with ChatGPT Plus subscription. Ensure you have the appropriate OpenAI subscription.
A specific version of the GPT-4 model enhanced for particular tasks or domains, potentially offering specialized capabilities or features compared to the standard GPT-4.
A smaller and more efficient version of gpt-4o, designed for environments with limited computational resources, providing a balance between performance and resource usage.
Default GPT-4 Turbo model used in ChatGPT Plus subscription. Ensure you have the appropriate OpenAI subscription.
Most capable GPT-3.5 model, optimized for current tasks.

smartVscode.openai.embeddingModel.markdownDescription: OpenAI Embedding model to use. **Use only if you have selected OpenAI.** [Documentation](https://beta.openai.com/docs/models/models).

smartVscode.tongyi.apiKey.markdownDescription: **Tongyi API Key**. **Use only if you have selected Tongyi.** [Get your Tongyi API Key](https://help.aliyun.com/zh/model-studio/developer-reference/get-api-key).

smartVscode.tongyi.chatLightModel.markdownDescription: Tongyi model for simple reasoning steps. **Use only if you have selected Tongyi.**
enumDescriptions: A high-performance model designed for enhanced accuracy and detailed responses, making it suitable for complex tasks and in-depth analysis.
A versatile model that balances performance and efficiency, providing quick responses while maintaining good quality for a wide range of applications.
An optimized model focused on speed, offering rapid response times ideal for applications where quick interaction is essential, without compromising too much on quality.

smartVscode.tongyi.chatAdvancedModel.markdownDescription: Advanced Tongyi model for complex reasoning steps. **Use only if you have selected Tongyi.**
enumDescriptions: A high-performance model designed for enhanced accuracy and detailed responses, making it suitable for complex tasks and in-depth analysis.
A versatile model that balances performance and efficiency, providing quick responses while maintaining good quality for a wide range of applications.
An optimized model focused on speed, offering rapid response times ideal for applications where quick interaction is essential, without compromising too much on quality.

smartVscode.tongyi.embeddingModel.markdownDescription: Tongyi Embedding model to use. **Use only if you have selected Tongyi.**

smartVscode.chatModelConfig.markdownDescription: Customize chat model configuration here. Refer to [Documentation](https://modelscope.github.io/agentscope/en/tutorial/203-model.html) for formats.

smartVscode.embeddingModelConfig.markdownDescription: Customize the embedding model configuration here. Refer to [Documentation](https://modelscope.github.io/agentscope/en/tutorial/203-model.html) for formats.

smartVscode.response.autoScroll.description: Automatically scroll to the bottom when a new question or response is added to the conversation window. You can disable this behavior by setting it to `false`.
